From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>


* Iron Raptor bowed her head and roared as Sinesis's ax drove deeply into 
her chest, it missed her spark but was still very close to hitting home. She 
breathed hard as mech fluid began to drip from her lips, her lungs had been 
punctured...she was sure of it!She propped herself up on her elbow.
Iron Raptor looked up slowly and saw Plintissa only a few feet away, she 
reached out to her but then collapsed to the ground. She was tired and 
loosing mech fluid fast, but she wouldn't risk calling anybot from base with 
a battle threatening...not just for her.
Iron Raptor laied on her side, breathing hard but steadily, that Pred could 
fight! She snarled as she slowly began to get up, first on her hands and 
knees, then her knees, finally her feet. She was unsteady but she made her 
way over to Plintissa and dropped to her knees beside her...mech fluid 
flowing from the wound in her chest and dripping from her lips...*

" Are you... alright?"
